sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattam'pi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
grammar: nt loc sg of niṭṭhitacīvara, comp
meaning: when the robe is complete, when the robe has been made

sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattam'pi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattam'pi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1:
When the robe [-cloth] is finished by a bhikkhu, when the kaṭhina [-
frame-privileges] have been withdrawn, if even for a single night a
bhikkhu should stay apart from the three robes, except with the
authorization of bhikkhus, [this is a case] involving expiation with
forfeiture.
